overview:
Art Director specialized in Fashion Design and Design Management.

In a constant search for ways and styles that express a high-quality work and produce strong influence and impact with maximum efficiency and functionality;

The special training and many professional experiences allow the design and the optimal development of creative projects in differen fields and disciplines:

fashion design and design editing and styling, branding and store concept, graphic design and web-intaractive multimedia and coordination, set-design, viral marketing and emotional installations, presentation, exhibitions
